caption.text:
Dengan berganti tahun baru, ayo kita coba hal-hal baru dan raih keinginan yang belum tercapai di tahun sebelumnya! So, True Warriors terus tanamkan semangat #NeverQuit !

Tulis #TahunBaru2022 #NeverQuit kalo lo siap hadapi segala tantangan di tahun 2022

Dengan berganti tahun baru, ayo kita coba hal-hal baru dan raih keinginan yang belum tercapai di tahun sebelumnya! So, True Warriors terus tanamkan semangat #NeverQuit !

Tulis #TahunBaru2022 #NeverQuit kalo lo siap hadapi segala tantangan di tahun 2022

True Warriors besok sudah pergantian tahun nih, Terima kasih buat lo yang udah semangat dan tetap kuat ngejalanin 2021 ini! Semoga lo mendapatkan apa yang diinginkan secepat mungkin!

So, apa harapan yang pengen lo capai di 2022 nanti? Share di kolom komentar ya!

Rafting adalah salah satu olahraga yang menantang dan memacu adrenalin. Lo perlu memperhatikan beberapa hal sebelum melakukan rafting supaya berjalan lancar. Apa saja kira-kira? Cari tahu di gambar ya!

Share lokasi rafting yang lo tau di kolom komentar ya.

True Warriors, tau gak sih kalo makin banyak orang yang gak pede karena dapet komentar negatif tentang bentuk fisiknya? Karena itu, ganti cara pandangan kita dengan memberi energi positif bagi orang sekitar daripada lebih menilai bentuk tubuh orang lain. Mari kita rayakan, keberagaman fisik satu sama lain.

Tulis #StopDigitalBodyShaming dan emoji 🖐 kalo lo setuju untuk katakan gak pada digital body shaming!

Salah satu pelajaran yang bisa kita ambil dari Spiderman adalah keberaniannya untuk ngelawan orang-orang yang ngebully dia. Peter Parker ngajarin kita kalo lo juga bisa seperti dia, menang ngelawan para pembully.

True Warriors, sudah siap ngeliat aksi sang jagoan laba-laba? Yang udah gak sabar banget nonton Spiderman, komen 🤟 di kolom komentar ya!

Indonesia memiliki banyak tempat indah dan menakjubkan untuk berpetualang, salah satunya 3 tempat di atas. Kalo ada kesempatan berpetualang sekarang, lo bakal pilih yang mana nih True Warriors? Komen dan tag 3 temen lo yang mau diajak ya!

Lo lebih suka kegiatan menantang seperti apa nih? Wall climbing atau surfing? Share pilihan lo di kolom komentar.

Apapun pilihan lo pastiin untuk terus pasang spirit #NeverQuit ya, True Warriors.

Work-life balance is a hard state to reach, and the majority of us might feel burned out. In this session, @hanamadness explains us how to face it.

"Self-reflection is very important when we are burned out, it's time to look back when we faced difficult times. Make it an encouragement to be better. Keep in mind that the situation is not good, it's only temporary and it will be better in the future if we can get through it!"

Feeling burned out is normal, but we have to control how we react to it! 

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

But, as a professional athlete, how do you keep motivated? 

"Train the mind and see everything from the positive side of whatever happens, healthy mind, discipline, and confident so that we can survive and never quit." Gagarin Nathaniel said.

It isn't easy to face the UnXpected, but it is important to keep ourselves positive and ready!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureoX

Have you ever thought, do we have the capacity to recover quickly from difficulties? How does these #Warriors do it?

Stay tuned because these two warriors, @hanamadness and @gerinathaniel, will be explaining how to build resilience to #NeverQuit in the future!

Mark the time and date; 11.30 on 28 November 2021! LIVE virtually only at @jagat.live or come and meet us at @mblocspace ✨

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

[ GIVEAWAY ALERT! ]

To lift up the hype for our upcoming Conference speaker, @kevinkwanbooks, author of the infamous ‘Crazy Rich Asians’ and ‘Rich People Problem’, we are giving away his books to 50 lucky winners! Yes, you read it right, FIFTY lucky winers!

Answer the question above correctly in the comment section and get a chance to win Kevin’s book! Make sure you follow all the rules as well!

This giveaway will start on November 26th until November 28th, 2021. Remember, read the terms & conditions above, and you’re all set. 

Drop your answer in the comments below! Good luck, IdeaFriends! 

*Terms & conditions apply
*Winners should be willing to claim the prize at the designated place (offline venue)

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX #Warrior #NeverQuit

IdeaFest 2021 #TheFutureofX, is presented by @prowarriors! 

And just another reminder, we are coming in a HYBRID FORMAT. Which means you can watch our some of our programs offline at @mblocspace and all programs online at @jagat.live!

This is your last call, because we’re coming from today until Sunday! (26-28 November 2021). So if you still haven’t got the tickets, go to www.ideafest.id NOW!

Remember, the future belongs to those who #NeverQuit, so see you guys!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021

The future belongs to those who #NeverQuit. Let's join the movement, because we're giving away 5 IdeaFest 2021 Live tickets (for virtual IdeaFest 2021) FOR FREE!

Write a letter for your Future self! Complete this letter and fill in the blanks with the warrior moment you've been experiencing before and suits you the best!

For example: 
"Very tolerant, never surrender @friend1 @friend2 @friend3, #TheFutureofX #NeverQuit"

Terms & Conditions:
1. Drop your answer in the comment section below.
2. Make sure you like this post and follow @ideafestid & @prowarriors Instagram.
3. Tag 2 of your friends and use the hashtag #TheFutureofX and #NeverQuit
4. Giveaway period: 19-22 November 2021
5. We will announce 5 winners on 23 November 2021 via @ideafestid IG story.
6. Each winner will get 1 (one) IdeaFest 2021 Live ticket (all access) ticket for free.
7. Make sure you have an active email and active WhatsApp number.
8. The chosen winners cannot be contested.

Good luck!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Despite the uncertainties and unXpected things, we’re all still here. So, let’s embrace #TheFutureofX together. Because the future belongs to warriors who #NeverQuit.

We’re proud to announce that #IdeaFest2021 is presented by @prowarriors.

#IdeaFest

IdeaFest 2021 is here!!

Marking our X (10th) anniversary, and celebrating the spirit of #warrior in embracing #TheFutureofX, we, together with @prowarriors, present to you: IdeaFest 2021. This year, we're coming with the first-hybrid format!

You can watch the #IdeaFest2021 offline version at M Bloc Space, Jakarta. And the vrtual version at www.jagat.live

From 26-28 November 2021, let’s learn and watch IdeaTalks, Conference, Music, and other insightful programs at IdeaFest 2021! Catch these cool and inspiring speakers & performers, such as: Tablo, Stefan Sagmeister, Kevin Kwan, Raffi Ahmad, Kunto Aji, Voice of Baceprot, Dian Sastrowardoyo, Lomba Sihir, Gita Wirjawan, Wregas Bhanuteja, and many more! ✨

The future belongs to those who #NeverQuit. So, what are you waiting for? Ticket(s) starts from IDR 35k ONLY! Save your seat at www.ideafest.id!

#IdeaFest

Don’t forget we have Xchievement Night around the corner!

But… What is Xchievement Night? And how can you watch it? Check out the slides above! This program is our way of paying homage to #Warrior from the creative industry who keeps fighting to make the industry better. Because the future belongs to those who #NeverQuit.

So, save the date and see you there!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Mendaki gunung bukan hal yang mudah lho, sebelum mendaki gunung ada baiknya lo tahu terlebih dahulu nih larangan apa aja yang gak boleh dilanggar. Biar gak terjadi sesuatu yang gak diinginkan.

True Warriors, tetap utamakan etika ya saat mendaki gunung. Agar hiking lo tetap seru dan selamat sampai balik ke rumah. Kalo lo setuju komen 👍 di kolom komentar ya!

Let's hear it from Sal Priadi, who's going to be our speaker on this year's IdeaTalks session brought to you by @prowarriors!

He's going to discuss his long journey and how he manage to fight through in the entertainment industry. 

You can watch it in the Holo channel on 26 November 2021, at 13:00 - 14:00! We'll see you there!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Kalo lo suka extreme sport, harus cobain olahraga paralayang setidaknya sekali seumur hidup. Karena banyak sekali spot paralayang di Indonesia dengan view menawan yang bikin lo jadi lupa daratan.

True Warriors, kalo ada kesempatan buat paralayang, mau dimana nih? Komen dan tag temen lo yang mau diajak paralayang bareng.

Are you a film lover or even work in the film industry? Then this session brought to you by @prowarriors is great for you!

Jason Iskandar and Aco Tenri will be talking about their career and breakthrough on the Film Industry. 

You can watch it in the Holo channel on 26 November 2021, at 14:00 - 15:00! Book your ticket(s) now at www.ideafest.id! 🙌

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Hari Pahlawan bisa jadi titik balik buat lo semua untuk selalu pantang menyerah dalam situasi apapun. Mari kita peringati dengan tunjukkan spirit lo dengan emoji fire dan mention orang yang lo anggap pahlawan di dalam hidup lo di kolom komentar!

Happy Heroes Day & keep the spirit #NeverQuit from the heroes!

Technology changes numerous directions, one of which is the journey of new media, which has an unXpected future. A session with full of inspiration presented by @prowarriors is here for you.

@trivelchili and @natashaabigeyl both experts and share the same passion for Media & Creative Industry. As the person who’s in charge in this industry, their biggest challenge is adapting to nowadays circumstances and, of course, massive digitalization throughout all of the media and platforms used in the industry.

Want to know how Trivet and Natasha challenge themselves and #NeverQuit to fight for the X-factor in Media & Creative Industry? Their sesion will held virtualy at @jagat.live 26 November 2021, channel Holo on 09:00-10:00 WIB. Save your seat by grabbing your IdeaFest 2021 ticket(s) only at www.ideafest.id!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

It's D-Day! 

Today is the Day-1 of #IdeaFest2021! Remember, the future belongs to those who never quit. So, we can't wait to see you at Holo Channel to meet our #Warriors today!

Can't wait to meet @__________saldi
@jasoniskandar @acotenri and @gerinathaniel 😎 

If you haven't secure your ticket go to www.ideafest.id NOW!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

D-1 before you can watch your favorite #Warrior sessions! Check out the video above and find out how you can watch it!

As you know, our virtual event will take place at @jagat.live, including IdeaTalks sessions presented by @prowarriors; featuring @trivetchilli, @natashaabigeyl, @gerinathaniel, @jasoniskandar, @acotenti, @hanamadness, and more!

If you still don’t know how to watch it, follow the simple steps above, and let’s meet up tomorrow at Jagat.Live. And don’t forget, the future belongs to thise who #NeverQuit.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX
Kira-kira lo bakal hiking kemana nih? Coba samain sama zodiak lo dan kasih tau di kolom komentar, True Warriors!
